question: What type of analysis do you want to perform?

answers.tooltip: Analyze data points indexed over time.

template.code:
import pandas as pd
pd.read_csv('data.csv', parse_dates=['timestamp'])
template.tooltip: This loads a CSV with time-indexed data.

followups.question: What kind of time series model?

template.code:
from statsmodels.tsa.arima.model import ARIMA
model = ARIMA(data, order=(1,1,1)).fit()
template.tooltip: Fit an ARIMA model to your data.

template.code:
from statsmodels.tsa.holtwinters import ExponentialSmoothing
model = ExponentialSmoothing(data).fit()
template.tooltip: Apply exponential smoothing to your time series.

template.code:
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier
model = RandomForestClassifier().fit(X_train, y_train)
template.tooltip: Train a classifier using labeled training data.
